array.string: ColdFusion 2021 has added a system function named ArrayPush.

ColdFusion 2021 has added a system function named AddAWSXrayMetadata.
ColdFusion 2021 has added a system function named GetKeyPairFromKeystore.
ColdFusion 2021 has added a system function named StructIsCaseSensitive.
ColdFusion 2021 has introduced static scope, static variable would now be reserved for scoping.
Do not use variable named static, or disable static support within CFC by setting property supportStatic to false
ColdFusion 2021 has modified the usage of CFPresentation tag. The usage of the attribute Format has been modified.
Ensure that format attribute is present and not set to empty value ""
ColdFusion 2021 has modified the behaviour of a system function named QueryFilter. The function no longer mutates the given input query, and returns a new object instead of modifying the given one.
To preserve the old behaviour, set JVM flag coldfusion.query.filter.mutateinputquery to true.
ColdFusion 2018 has modified the usage of CFDocument tag. The usage of the attribute FlashPaper has been retired.
Check the usage of the attributes useWebkit of the tag CFDocument.
ColdFusion 2018 has modified the usage of CFFunction tag. The attributes of the tag have been modified.
Check the usage of the CFFunction.
ColdFusion 2018 has deprecated the attribute requesttimeout for the tag cfschedule.
Check the updated doc of tag cfschedule.
ColdFusion 2018 has deprecated the attribute fieldBoost,docBoost for the tag cfindex.
Check the updated doc of tag cfindex.
ColdFusion 2018 has modified the usage of CFSet tag. Closures are now supported in tag syntax as well.
Check the usage of the CFSet.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named RunAsync.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named StructIsOrdered.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named ArrayFirst.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named cachegetengineproperties.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named ArrayLast.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named QueryDeleteRow.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named QueryDeleteColumn.
ColdFusion 2018 has added a system function named onRestRequest.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named StructToSorted.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named SpreadsheetGetColumnCount.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QuerySort.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryReduce.
ColdFusion 2021 has modified the usage of system function CreateObject. The value 'corba' for the parameter 'type' has been removed.
Check the usage of the parameter 'type' of the function CreateObject.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryMap.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named EncodeFor.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ArrayContainsNoCase.

ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFCache tag. The attributes of the tag have been modified.
Check the usage of the CFCache.

Deprecated. Starting with ColdFusion 2016, the path attribute will be ignored. All the collections will be created in the collections directory at the location specified in Solr_Home field in the ColdFusion administrator page
Check the usage of the attribute path of the tag CFCollection.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFSpreadSheet tag.
Check the usage of the attribute autosize of the tag CFSpreadSheet.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFloop tag.
Check the usage of the tag CFloop.

ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFQuery tag. The usage of attributes cachedAfter and scale have been updated and the attributes connectString, DBName, DBServer, provider, providerDSN and sql have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedAfter, scale, connectString, DBName, DBServer, provider, providerDSN and sql of the tag CFQuery.

ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFStoredProc tag. The usage of the attribute cachedAfter has been updated and the attributes connectString, DBName, DBServer, DBType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedAfter, connectString, DBName, DBServer, DBType, provider and providerDSN of the tag CFStoredProc.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFDBInfo tag. The attribute datasource is now an optional attribute.
Check the usage of the attribute datasource of the tag CFDBInfo.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFDocument tag. The attribute useWebkit has been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes useWebkit of the tag CFDocument.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFPdf tag.
Check the usage of the tag CFPdf.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFPDFParam tag. The attribute source is now a required attribute.
Check the usage of the attribute source of the tag CFPDFParam.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cflog tag. The attributes date, thread and time have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes date, thread and time of the tag cflog.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cferror tag. The value 'monitor' for the exception attribute has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute exception of the tag cferror.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfgridupdate tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfgridupdate.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfinsert tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfinsert.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfstoredproc tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfstoredproc.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfupdate tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfupdate.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfquery tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, provider, providerDSN and sql have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, provider, providerDSN and sql of the tag cfquery.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of dbType attribute of cfquery tag. Some possible values of dbType attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the dbType attribute of cfquery tag.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfcache tag. The attributes cachedirectory and timeout have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedirectory and timeout of the tag cfcache.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cffile tag. Some possible values of attributes attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes attribute of the tag cffile.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfftp tag. The attribute agentname has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute agentname of the tag cfftp.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfldap tag. The attribute filterFile has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute filterFile of the tag cfldap.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfcollection tag. Some possible values of action attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the action attribute of the tag cfcollection.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfform tag. The attributes passThrough and enableCAB have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes passThrough and enableCAB of the tag cfform.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfinput tag. The attribute passThrough has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute passThrough of the tag cfinput.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfsearch tag. The attributes external and language have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes external and language of the tag cfsearch.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfselect tag. The attribute passThrough has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute passThrough of the tag cfselect.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfslider tag. The attributes img, imgStyle, grooveColor, refreshLabel, tickmarkimages, tickmarklabels, tickmarkmajor and tickmarkminor have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes img, imgStyle, grooveColor, refreshLabel, tickmarkimages, tickmarklabels, tickmarkmajor and tickmarkminor of the tag cfslider.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cflocation tag. If Secure Profile is enabled, default value for addtoken attribute will be false.
Check the usage of the attribute addtoken of the tag cflocation.
